allow:
Bash(jj commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Nix flake for Azure DevOps Pipelines agent

Package the Azure DevOps Pipelines self-hosted agent \(v4.268.0\) as a
Nix derivation with autoPatchelfHook for prebuilt .NET binaries, and
provide a NixOS module for running it as a systemd service.

- flake.nix: flake-parts based, x86_64-linux + aarch64-linux
- package.nix: fetchurl from Azure CDN, autoPatchelfHook, wrapper scripts
- module.nix: services.azure-pipelines-agent.instances.<name> with PAT auth,
  extraPackages, systemd hardening
EOF
\)")
